name: Catrail
description:
Made for notGDCJam 2020.
bOI, making games is hard isn't it?

This was our the first attempt at a video game any of us has ever made. And I gotta say, it's pretty darn awesome. Even if it isn't finishied...

The idea for the game was basically, cartoon cats walking on realistic backgrounds (of trains).
If you wish to, you can check in on this game occasionally, we will update it, since it was almost finished.

Art by @Draakots on Deviantart and @@Laura46398038
Written by @SanQuilmas on Github
Photography by @christ_hdz
Developed by @DavidUzielGH
